Articles.Content:
today noticed a new one, first time its happened so hopefully not too serious.

at KSC, noticed I had half a dozen messages so clicked to open them, window came up, but couldn't get the control buttons at the bottom to appear, and couldn't close the window or interact with anything else.

could left & right button through the messages but not dismiss them.

 

Also is it just me or does this now lag like a laggy thing?

70-80 part rocket and the clock is yellow which it didn't used to be and looks like the frame rate has seriously dropped
